element.short: Name for this particular element definition (reference target)
element.definition: The name of this element definition (to refer to it from other element definitions using ElementDefinition.nameReference). This is a unique name referring to a specific set of constraints applied to this element. One use of this is to provide a name to different slices of the same element.
element.comments: The name SHALL be unique within the structure within the context of the constrained resource element.  (Though to avoid confusion, uniqueness across all elements is recommended.).
element.requirements: Allows referencing a defined element.  May also be used for code generation purposes.
